article_title: Lindeen exploring run for Montana secretary of state
article_text:

article_metadata.news_keywords: , monica lindeen, auditor, secretary of state, helena, linda mcculloch, election
article_metadata.author: Missoulian State Bureau

og.description: HELENA – State Auditor Monica Lindeen confirmed Wednesday that’s she exploring whether to run for Montana secretary of state in 2016, but said she’s a long way from deciding.
